text: May I know the debug tools used in HubSpot CRM. I tried debugger; and console.log('xxxx') statements in the CRM cards and the code execution didn't stop at the breakpoint.

<@U05A2N9DVGT> if I understand your request right, you would like to use the usual debugging methods of console.og and breakpoints to debug extensions, is that right?

If you add console.log statements, they do come up in the private app logs (on logs tab) but they run into 4k limits of AWS. We are working to solve this more holistically, and I will keep this channel posted on this.
